triples.name: Sharp-SAT
triples.relevance: Weighted model counting generalizes #SAT by computing weighted linear combinations of satisfying models, core technique proposed in paper

triples.name: Sharp P
triples.relevance: Computational complexity class that establishes the #P-hardness of model counting problems

triples.name: Heuristic
triples.relevance: Value heuristic proposed to guide search towards high-weight models

triples.name: Bayesian network
triples.relevance: Application domain for computing marginal probabilities in probabilistic inference

triples.name: Probabilistic inference
triples.relevance: Central application of WMC for computing probabilities from graphical models

triples.name: Monte Carlo method
triples.relevance: Sampling-based baseline approach that paper's deterministic method contrasts with

triples.name: Graph theory
triples.relevance: Underlying theory for reliability estimation in probabilistic graphs

triples.name: Convergence of random variables
triples.relevance: Statistical guarantee framework that bounds convergence of sampling-based methods

triples.name: SAT solver
triples.relevance: Tool category for solving Boolean satisfiability problems that relate to model counting
